ygData.subject: DING!!  Welcome to Level 16
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey all - I play on Xev server (anyone else??) and am new to these yahoo clubs. I d love to meet up with anyone who plays on Xev for some fun. I have 2 chars -
ygData.messageBody:
Hey all - I play on Xev server (anyone else??)
and am new to these yahoo clubs. I'd love to meet up
with anyone who plays on Xev for some fun. I have 2
chars - Xela is a lvl 16 wood elf druid, and Serrafina
is a lvl 16 gnome mage. Serra is a member of the
Defenders of Mithril Hall, but Xela has not found a home
yet, and is looking for a guild to match his love of
nature and worship of Mother Tunare. Please let me know
if you have info on the Xev guilds. <br><br>I'm also
looking for some good druid gear (there HAS to be
something better than leather for my level), so please let
me know what you think I should be searching for, if
you've been here before. <br><br>Also, i've done a lot
of research lately on tinkering and spell research
for my gnome. Let me know if you have questions, or
advice - as i'm ready to jump in!! (actually, i think
i'll wait till lvl 19 to start w/ research).
<br><br>Go with Tunare!!<br><br>Xela (soon to be Xela
Orcbane)of Xev<br>16th season wood elf
druid<br><br>Serrafina of Xev<br>16th season gnome mage
